caption.p: Ca- and Si-rich basaltic volcanic spherules and basaltic glass fragments from Pilauco. ( a, b) Group 3 volcanic spherules contain SiO 2 at >17 wt.% and SO 3 at >1 wt.%, but lack Cr 2O 3. Compositions are listed in Supplementary Table S7. ( c, d) Vesicular basaltic glass fragments from a height of 548 cm that are commonly found in all samples from the Pilauco profile. These fragments of basaltic glass contain Cr-rich inclusions and are geochemically similar to the Group 3 volcanic spherules in ( a, b).
